conversationId.description: ID of existing conversation to load (UUID format). Leave empty to start a new conversation. Bind to a parameter or view custom property to resume conversations.

userName.description: User name for conversation ownership and filtering. Bind to session user (e.g., {session.props.auth.user.userName}) or leave empty for anonymous. Used to filter conversation history by user.

projectName.description: REQUIRED: Name of the Ignition project to analyze. Bind to session project (e.g., {session.props.projectName} or {session.project}). The AI uses this to locate and read project files, views, scripts, and resources.

showHistory.description: Show conversation history or just current exchange

showTokenUsage.description: Show token usage per message and in footer

enableAutoCompaction.description: Enable automatic conversation compaction when approaching token limit. Summarizes old messages to keep context under limit.

compactionTokenThreshold.description: Token count threshold to trigger compaction (default: 180000). Lower for testing, raise to defer compaction.

compactToRecentMessages.description: Number of recent messages to keep in full detail during compaction (default: 30). Older messages get summarized.

showScheduledTasks.description: Show scheduled tasks panel with slideout
